artist: Designer: R. Connor; Mill: The Thai Silk Co. Ltd.; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description:
Large hand printed (dots) stems & leaves. Handwoven. Beige, white;
Cut piece. No right selvedge. Frays. Written on reverse upper left corner "S/O 5459 3/5/81 LDS European Master." (beige)
dimension: overall (Not trimmed): 30 x 70 3/4 in. (76.2 x 179.71 cm)
title: Estrellita (silk)
